properties.entry: SELECT STUDENT_NO,STUDENT_NAME, 100+TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YY'))-TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(STUDENT_SSN,1,2)) 나이 ,STUDENT_PHN,STUDENT_EMAIL ,STUDENT_ADR,STUDENT_GRD,ADMISSION FROM TB_STUDENTS WHERE STUDENT_DEPT = (SELECT DEPARTMENT_NO FROM TB_DEPARTMENT WHERE DEPARTMENT_NAME = ? )
SELECT PRO_NAME,100+TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YY'))-TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(PRO_SSN,1,2)) 나이 FROM TB_PROFESSOR WHERE PRO_DEPT = (SELECT DEPARTMENT_NO FROM TB_DEPARTMENT WHERE DEPARTMENT_NAME = ? )
SELECT CLASS_NAME,CLS_GRADE FROM TB_GRADE JOIN TB_CLASS USING(CLASS_NO) JOIN TB_STUDENTS ON (CLS_STDNO = STUDENT_NO) WHERE CLS_STDNO = ? AND STUDENT_NAME = ?
SELECT PRO_PHN,PRO_EMAIL FROM TB_PROFESSOR JOIN TB_DEPARTMENT ON (PRO_DEPT = DEPARTMENT_NO) WHERE DEPARTMENT_NAME = ? AND PRO_NAME = ?
SELECT ACCOUNT_ID FROM TB_PRO_ACCOUNT WHERE ACCOUNT_ID = ?
SELECT * FROM TB_PROFESSOR JOIN TB_DEPARTMENT ON (DEPARTMENT_NO = PRO_DEPT) WHERE PRO_NAME = ? AND PRO_SSN = ? AND DEPARTMENT_NAME = ?
SELECT * FROM TB_PRO_ACCOUNT WHERE ACCOUNT_ID = ? AND ACCOUNT_PW = ?
SELECT ACCESS_YN FROM TB_PRO_ACCOUNT WHERE ACCOUNT_ID = ? AND ACCOUNT_PW = ?
SELECT * FROM TB_STUDENTS WHERE STUDENT_NAME = ? AND STUDENT_NO = ?
SELECT * FROM TB_ADMIN WHERE ADMIN_ID = ? AND ADMIN_PW = ?
SELECT * FROM TB_PRO_ACCOUNT JOIN TB_PROFESSOR USING(PRO_NO) JOIN TB_DEPARTMENT ON(PRO_DEPT = DEPARTMENT_NO) WHERE ACCESS_YN = 'N'
